q_en: What raw materials are used by Skilled Sewers?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the details of the raw materials used by the "Skilled Sewers" working group. Here's a breakdown of the products they work with:

| **Product ID** | **Description** |
|----------------|-----------------|
| 2              | Product related to sewing task 8 |
| 6              | Product related to sewing task 17 |
| 7              | Product related to sewing task 18 |
| 8              | Product related to sewing task 19 |
| 9              | Product related to sewing task 23 |
| 10             | Product related to sewing task 27 |
| 14             | Product related to sewing task 28 |
| 23             | Product related to sewing task 29 |

These products are the result of various sewing tasks carried out by the "Skilled Sewers" group. If you need more details about each product, feel free to ask! ðŸ˜Š

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Skilled Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Skilled Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = 7;
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing task IDs associated with the "Skilled Sewers" working group

steps.sql: SELECT order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE id IN (8, 17, 18, 19, 23, 27, 28, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the order product IDs associated with the sewing tasks

steps.sql: SELECT product_id FROM order_product WHERE id IN (8, 17, 18, 19, 23, 27, 28, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs associated with the order products

steps:
1 validation error for tool_get_wip_materialsSchema
product_id
  none is not an allowed value (type=type_error.none.not_allowed)

steps.input:
Retrieve the original materials for each work-in-progress material
['tool_get_original_materials, {\'wip_id\': None}, Get the original materials for a work-in-progress material']
steps.output: To retrieve the original materials for each work-in-progress material, I need the IDs of the work-in-progress (WIP) materials. Please provide those IDs, and I'll assist you further.
